application_description.message: Playback video files containing H.265 / HEVC media.

doubleclick_fullscreen.message: Please double-click the video to toggle fullscreen.

filesystem_api_required.message: The chrome.fileSystem API is required to play videos.

player_crashed.message: We are sorry, but the player crashed, please try again.

could_not_load_player.message: The player could not be loaded, please reinstall the application.

buffer_underrun.message: Your computer is too slow to decode the movie in realtime, playback performance may suffer.

unknown_playback_error.message: The selected file could not be loaded or contains an unsupported format.

error_msg_open_input.message: Could not open input, please make sure the selected file is readable and contains a supported video format.

error_msg_no_streams.message: Could not open input, please make sure the selected file is readable and contains a supported video format.

error_msg_no_supported_streams.message: The selected file uses an unsupported video and/or audio codec. Please select a file containing H.265/HEVC video and AAC, AC3, MP3 or OGG audio.
